definitions: a person who engages in a contest

examples.text: the leading team among the nine challengers

definitions: a person who makes a rival claim to or threatens someone's hold on a position

examples.text: a serious challenger for the title
a potential challenger for the party leadership

shortDefinitions: person who makes rival claim to or threatens someone's hold on position

definitions: a person who disputes the truth of or places themselves in opposition to something

examples.text: the bold challenger of campus orthodoxy

shortDefinitions: person who disputes truth of or places themselves in opposition to something
